data.title: Simpson Thacher & Bartlett LLP
data.meta_description: Simpson Thacher & Bartlett LLP is an international law firm headquartered in New York City, employing over 1,300 attorneys in 11 offices worldwide.
data.text:
Latest News

Mars to Acquire Kellanova

Simpson Thacher is representing Mars, Incorporated in connection with the financing aspects of its announced acquisition of Kellanova. The deal represents a total enterprise value of $35.9 billion. Read More >

Paramount to Combine with Skydance

The Firm is representing Paramount in connection with its proposed merger with Skydance. The terms of the agreement value the combined company at an enterprise value of approximately $28 billion. Read More >

New Mountain Capital Completes $15.4 Billion Fundraising

The Firm advised New Mountain Capital in the formation of New Mountain Partners VII, which closed at $14 billion in third party capital commitments and $15.4 billion in aggregate capital commitments. Read More >

Simpson Thacher Secures Denial of Class Certification in Suit Against M&T Bank

Simpson Thacher secured a victory for M&T Bank in connection with a proposed investor class action related to the $3.7 billion merger between M&T Bank and Hudson City Bancorp. Read More >

Simpson Thacher Announces Boston Office Plans

The Firm announced that it will open an office in Boston, Massachusetts. Read More >

EQT Infrastructure III to sell Lumos to JV between T-Mobile and EQT Infrastructure VI

The Firm is representing EQT Infrastructure III in the sale of its portfolio company Lumos to a joint venture between T-Mobile and the EQT Infrastructure VI Fund. Read More >

EQT Announces Successful Closing of EQT X at €22 billion

Simpson Thacher advised EQT in connection with the establishment of its tenth buyout fund, EQT X. EQT announced that the fund raised €22 billion, exceeding its €20 billion target. Read More >

Our Firm

For 140 years, we have put our collective experience to work

for one simple purpose: our clients' success.
